name: Tectonic Detector
uniques: Population loss from nuclear attacks [-50]% [in this city]

name: Artificial Ecoregion
uniques: [+1 Food] from [Organic] tiles [in this city] <when number of [Food] is greater than [9]>
[+1 Food] from [Organic] tiles [in this city] <when number of [Food] is greater than [19]>

name: Introduce Earth Species
uniques: Remove [Introduce Earth Species] [in this city] <hidden from users>

civilopediaText.text: Species that humans intentionally transport to new regions can subsequently become successfully.

name: Diatom
uniques: [+1 Production] from [Fresh water] tiles [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: Diatoms appeared in Earth's Cretaceous period and have made up half of the ocean's sediments ever since. The dispersal of diatomaceous earth by westerly winds makes the desert fertile every year. Diatomaceous earth is also of industrial value.

name: Bony Fishes
uniques: [-1 Food] from [Sindrian Lobster] tiles [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: Teleost fishes make up most of the vertebrates on Earth, and their introduction to this region would have a tremendous impact on the ecosystem.

name: Horse Chestnut
uniques: [+1 Food] from [Exotic Fruits] tiles [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: Horse chestnut is a deciduous tree. Dead leaves serve as food for xenos. Also, tree nuts are poisonous, but xenos may like them.
Corals are extremely delicate creatures. If this species could be introduced, it would become a tourist resource and the advertising effect would be tremendous.

name: Kelp
uniques: [+1 Food] from [Sindrian Lobster] tiles [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: Kelp is the most important species in the marine ecosystem. It not only provides food and produces large amounts of oxygen, but also improves water quality. That's why brown algae are always planted in aquariums.
Tree Sparrows are pests that eat grain, but they also eat pests that breed in fields. On this planet where there are many pests, they will be the savior of your farming village.

name: Tree Sparrow
uniques: [+1 Gold] from [Sindrian Lobster] tiles [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: Tree Sparrows are pests that eat grain, but they also eat pests that breed in fields. On this planet where there are many pests, they will be the savior of your farming village.

name: Beaver
uniques: [+1 Food] from [Fresh water] tiles [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: Beavers are natural architects. Dams built by beavers change the flow of rivers and help new species go through the river. Their presence will create biodiversity in the river.
Domestic dogs are a source of comfort to humans, but wild dogs are a fear to nature. We must pay close attention to the rabies pandemic.
